vacancies.title: Graphic designer
vacancies.description:
Hello. We at CreativePeople are looking for a middle graphic designer to join our design team. Remotely, from anywhere in our country where you have good internet. Experience in developing logos and corporate styles is a must.
We have many large Russian companies in our portfolio, with some of which we have been working for many years and doing a variety of projects, from websites to mobile applications.

vacancies.title: Service engineer
vacancies.description:
You will have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the world of low-current systems on which the Internet is built and social networks, messengers and much more operate.
You will acquire a sought-after profession in the IT field, our specialists will train you from scratch without any investment on your part.
We offer a fixed stipend for the first three months of work, flexible hours, work close to home, registration under the Labor Code or individual entrepreneurship, you will be able to manage your income yourself, we will provide you with everything you need for work, you will get the opportunity to see all of the country, a friendly team, a developed corporate culture

vacancies.title: Sales consultant
vacancies.description:
If you want to enjoy your work, give positive emotions to customers, love jewelry and want to become part of the best team in the jewelry industry - we will be glad to see you!
Your tasks: Consult clients on the range of products, maintain a high level of customer service, be part of a large and ambitious team.

vacancies.title: Sales representative
Cook
vacancies.description:
What you will be doing:
Preparing Russian cuisine
Working at the cash register
Maintaining the cleanliness of the workplace
Your experience as a: cook, cashier, sales floor employee, restaurant employee, dough mixer, prep cook, waiter, barista, kitchen worker, kitchen worker or food production/restaurant/cafe worker is an advantage, but not required.

vacancies.title: Warehouse worker/picker
vacancies.description:
Your tasks will include:
order selection (work in a warehouse)
work using a data collection terminal
work on loading equipment
We expect from you:
Desire to work and earn money with LENTA!
We invite candidates without work experience - we will teach you everything!

vacancies.title: Teamlead
vacancies.description: We are looking for an experienced team leader who will lead a team of developers (up to 5 people) working on two interesting projects: 1. Saas solution for hotels Satisfy Travel 2. Wishlist service Podarkus Requirements: At least one year of experience in a similar position Experience in developing React/NextJS, Jest, TypeScript, HTML, CSS Knowledge of Golang, PHP, Docker, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Linux, Git Understanding of REST, gRPC, GitLab, CI/CD, k8s, Postgres Responsibilities: Development of a technical solution, decomposition, distribution and control of tasks Sprint planning and deadline control Code Review Maintaining accompanying documentation Training the development team, recruiting employees

vacancies.title: Web programmer
Frontend developer
vacancies.description:
At Zebra Corporate Digital, we specialize in developing solutions for the largest Russian and leading foreign companies. Our product is complex web services and high-load corporate resources.
What's on the stack: JavaScript, Vue.JS (v2, v3), ES5+, SCSS, Webpack, Docker, GitLab, as well as Nuxt.js, JAM (Gridsome + Directus) / SSR

What tasks?

Development of new functionality on Vue.js/Vanilla JS

Analysis of requirements and design of technical solutions for them

Work on the development of projects (external and internal), participation in the implementation of new technologies

Development and support of the Design System

vacancies.title: Frontend developer Vue
JavaScript developer
vacancies.description:
We make a collaboration platform and document editors that can be deployed on your server or embedded in a third-party web application. Yes, we are a team that seriously competes with Microsoft and Google, and we are doing great! 
Our solutions are used by major European universities, government agencies, commercial companies, NGOs and individual users. According to our most conservative estimates, this is more than 7 million users worldwide. 
 
We are looking for a JavaScript programmer to join our team. 
Tasks: 
Development of an office suite of applications (documents, tables, presentations) that works on the web and on mobile devices. 
Writing algorithms on the frontend side in pure js without using frameworks, tasks for WebAssembly are possible. 
Working with graphics, rendering a document on Canvas. 
Working on a product that is used by tens of millions of users around the world.

vacancies.title: Flutter developer
